comments:
WSAD profiling mode cannot find the file, java.policy, on the network drive. 
The same appliation with the policy file placed on local drive, profiling works 
fine. 

1)Is this the java.policy file in the JRE?  Is the JRE on a network drive?
The file java.policy comes with JRE, but I move it to network drive for testing 
purpose. JRE is not on network drive.

2) any error messages and where they occur
java.security.AccessControlException: access denied    
(java.io.FilePermission
C:\DATEN\tks\source\acs\config\acsresources.ini read)      
at      java.security.AccessControlContext.checkPermission
(AccessControlContext.java:286)  

3) steps to reproduce the problem
Profile the program with following VM argument:
-Djava.security.policy =h:\.java.policy
h is network drive. (If h is local drive, there is no problem)

4) What version of WSAD and RAC is the customer using 
WSAD5.0. 

5) What platform/OS is the WSAD and RAC running on?  Are they both running on 
the same machine 
Windows NT4.0 SP6. WSAD and RAC are on the same machine.
This is a permenant restiction.  We cannot load files on the network correctly.
